menuItemSaveQuote.description: Title of context menu item that saves the selected text when clicked.

btnHighlightQuote.description: A button that highlights the quote on the page.

btnCopyQuote.description: A button that copies a quote to the user's clipboard.

btnDeleteQuote.description: A button that deletes a quote.

QuoteCopiedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteCopied.message: The quote was successfully copied to your clipboard.
QuoteCopied.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteDeletedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteDeleted.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

NoQuotesYet.description: Title shown in sidebar when the current page does not have any quotes saved yet.

NoQuotes_GetStarted.message: Get started by selecting text on the page.
NoQuotes_GetStarted.description: Paragraph shown in sidebar when page does not have any quotes yet.

CloseDialog.description: Caption for screen readers to close a dialog.

NotSpecified.description: A placeholder shown when a page metadata element does not have a value yet.

btnCancel.description: Button text to not save changes.

MetadataForHostname.description: Page action caption for displaying article metadata (publish date, contributors, etc) for a webpage.

Article title.description: Label for the title of an article.

Website title.description: Label for the title of the website

Publisher.description: Label for the name of the article's publisher or sponsor

Canonical address.description: Label for the absolute URL for the article.

Publish date.description: Label for the date the article was published online.

Contributors.description: Label for contributors (author, editor, illustrator, etc) to the article.
